Text:
I dug out my long lost login just so I could comment on this torrent. 

THANK YOU! It's Superb! 

They are MP3's instead of FLAC, however, there are so Many files, I'm grateful as I can just plunk them on my iPod without having to convert them. They sound great. Very well done torrent.

Thanks again- I'm so very happy to find this wonderful happy music all in one place. It's perfect to ice skate outdoors to, even if just in  my mind. :-)
Thank you so much for sharing this!
